info.name: AMQ - Air and Dusk transparent
info.description:
an Air background and a dusk-inspired colorscheme for https://animemusicquiz.com
Enjoy it more looking at what you love.
Transparent version of https://userstyles.org/styles/172094/amq-air-and-dusk
info.additionalInfo:
Background images can be altered by changing the link in the variable declared at the top.
More colors and images will be exported to CSS Variables fairly soon.

Want to contribute or make your own? Join the Discord server: https://discord.gg/7sFRUtH

--Updated the style to match changes in the game--
